info.name: Mattermost kompact
info.description: A more compact style for Mattermost that allows much more content to fit on screen.  Includes a smaller font, tighter spacing, a narrower sidebar, a more concise reply header.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated to work with Mattermost 3.8.2 and the Teams feature.

For best results, enable compact display ( Account Settings > Display > Message Display ).

For even more compactness, combine this style with one of the "Mattermost hidden time" or "Mattermost 24h" styles.
